Document:
# Medical Department SOP These are the list of SOPs that Medical Personnel should follow. These are, as stated before, [bold]not checklists[/bold] and should be treated as guidelines.
For purposes of condensing entries, [color=#42636d][bold]Medical Doctor[/bold][/color], [color=#42636d][bold]Medical Intern[/bold][/color], [color=#42636d][bold]Paramedic[/bold][/color] are combined.
The following jobs have entries in this Department, the [color=#1b67a5][bold]Chief Medical Officer[/bold][/color] being the Head of Staff: - [textlink="Chief Medical Officer" link="ChiefMedicalOfficer SOP"] - [textlink="Chemist" link="Chemist SOP"] - [textlink="Paramedic" link="DoctorIntern SOP"] - [textlink="Medical Doctor" link="DoctorIntern SOP"] - [textlink="Medical Intern" link="DoctorIntern SOP"]
